issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Steps to reproduce:

1. click "Create Report"
2. click on any of the text fields of "Add charge" section ("Date", "Merchant name", "Transaction")
3. click anywhere out of the field to focus out

Result: an exception is thrown, the app is frozen. (see the attached screenshot)
fields.summary: Win8: An exception is thrown when focusing out of "Add charge" text fields (A)
fields.environment: Windows 8 RP on a VM, tablet simulator
